I've started following up with the wonderful #TidyTuesday event where R users across the globe join in on summarizing and arranging [publicly available data](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) to make meaningful charts with ggplot2, tidyr, dplyr, and other tools in the tidyverse.
Here are some of my latest submissions.
